website_summaries.verdict: Sumptuous facial mask with a luxurious feel that truly changes your skin for the better.
pros: The gel formula of the mask makes this product unique
Works to repair your skin by using the gel to get rid of blemishes and dirt on your skin
You don't need to use a lot to see results
cons: A little on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I compared this product to the sample I received from Ulta. I used this product on half my face and then the sample from Ulta. I was amazed at the price difference from Ulta and Amazon. However, this is definitely not genuine. It does work but this product was not making my skin as soft and amazing feeling as the legit one from Ulta. If you want the real deal I wouldn't buy it off here.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: The best mask to sleep and have extra hydration and moisture to your skin
customer_reviews.text: The best mask to put over and sleep to achieve extra hydration
customer_reviews.author: monica coelho

customer_reviews.title: It's just fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: It's just fabulous!!!!! and it's time to re-order for the fifth time now I even bought one for my sister and she's bought it on her own too it's amazing! Put it in the fridge for those nights that you've gone out drinking! Trust me your skin will thank you for it in the morning! Get it it's great !
customer_reviews.author: Who111

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love love this product especially the price. I like putting it on at night n I rinse it off till the morning. My face feels smooth n flawless when I rinse.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel mask. Feels great when you apply it, and you can leave it on. Love the other two Peter Thomas items I have too - the pumpkin and the gold. All three are great!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in a multi-pack with others. I love it. It firms up nicely and I can leave it on all night if I need some intense masking. I feel like this is going to last a very long time. It smells good and seems to work: my skin seems softer and more lush, it's also seemed to reduce some of the finer lines.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hannigan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I put a thin layer on at night before bed. I wake in the morning, wash it off and my face feels so smooth and soft. It has completely changed my skin for the better! Plus, a little goes a long way! I haven't even made a dent in the container.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Like other reviewers, I also found this to help reverse the damage the alcohol does to my skin, and it’s also good for renewing any breakout areas when it’s your time of the month. This stuff is amazingly effective and definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mask!
customer_reviews.text: This mask was recommended by Kathleen Jennings (@kathleenjenningsbeauty) and it has become my favorite mask of all time! I usually wear it overnight. I LOVE the consistency (goopy but dries pretty quickly) and the smell (fresh, rose scent). I have also noticed that my skin looks tighter after I wear it. My skin is acne-prone but this mask also seems to clear my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have followed so many beauty bloggers who constantly brag about how great this product is for their skin. It’s also good a good conductor for use with my glo-pro device.

It really is a treat during the summer! The scent is very pleasant too. I've noticed that my skin has felt more hydrated since using this product. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I had a great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I use it every other night for the most part. I can definitely see a difference when I use this stem cell product for more than a few day at a time. It make your skin very hydrated. I warn though not to use it before applying makeup, sometimes it makes your makeup have a greasy sheen to it. Not all the time but sometimes. It's not a good look. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesrealy

customer_reviews.title: I love the rose smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the rose smell, and it leaves my face feeling hydrated. The directions recommend leaving it on for just 10 minutes, but I use it overnight, and that seems to produce the best results.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like its smell. My face is really smooth after using it before going to bed.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I wash my face, apply Thayer's Witch Hazel and Rose Hip toner, then apply this Rose Stem Cell Bio Repair and top it off with Boots anti-aging night cream! They all work wonders together! I am 32 with minimal lines and those lines have gotten way less visible in the month that I have started using these products together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jdubs43

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice. No issues the first time, just kind of dried into clumps on my face. The second time. ..well, I now look like a burn victim. The skin all around my eyes is red, swollen, lizard like textured and I'm peeling all over. My skin is very tender and painful and it's been 4 days since I last used it. Needless to say, it's now in the garbage. I do have sensitive skin, but I've never had a reaction like this with anything, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful, hydrating mask. It's very soothing and I enjoy the smell of it. It does become a bit difficult to remove after the 10 min, but it's totally worth it. It leaves my skin looking bright, soft, hydrated, and my skin tone looks more even. I like to alternate this with the Glamglow Thirsty Mud and mask sheets. My skin has never looked better!

customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try the PTR Rose Stem Cell Gel, but it wasn't as great as I imagined. Feels great going on and smells amazing. But I didn't see any significant change in my normal/dry skin. Jar is huge so it def lasts for a while! If looking for a good mask to hydrate your skin def try Glam Glow Hydrating Mask! I sleep with it on it's amazing. That is def one I will keep buying.

customer_reviews.title: Come up smelling like roses!
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely and sinks in quickly since it is a gel. I don't wash it off but use this as a leave on to soothe and make my face feel great. It's not a heavy moisturizer so I have been applying this before I put on makeup. It leaves a soft, smooth canvas and seems to reduce the redness of my skin. The jar is huge for the price too. If you want something light and you love the smell of roses, go for it! If your skin is really dry, this probably won't work for you but might supplement your heavier moisturizers.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle gel!!

I took off a star bc it would likely retain its potency (claims of stem cells, etc) if it were in a tube or a pump instead of a tub. Also, it does dry slightly sticky. It will last me a long time; however, I will likely NOT purchase it again (the Paula's Choice Redness Relief line is actually my preference both in packaging and price).

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets very dry and I have visible pores. After reading all of the positive reviews on this product, I was very excited to try it out. I've been using it for about two weeks now, and have noticed no difference in my skin. The jar states it can be washed off, or applied as a mask overnight. I've tried both methods several times and have seen no effect on my skin. It doesn't even give my face that soft, ultra-moisturized feeling like a lot of the cheaper, drugstore products do. The only positives to this product are that it's pretty and it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: kristin815

customer_reviews.title: What does "Rose Stem Cels" really mean?
customer_reviews.text: They said "rose stem cells" so I assumed it was real stem cells that can morph into other cells. Perfect gift for woman in her 40's. Ha ha they must mean the cells from ground up or pressed rose stems and not real stem cells. Looks like a jar of dippety-do. She threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in CA

customer_reviews.title: A total success!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this entire line of products. Having been hooked on the cucumber mask, I decided to take a leap into the Rose Stem Cell line. I was not disappointed. The fragrance is clean and light, and the mask works exactly as it promises. My older, highly sensitive and sun damaged skin loves this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Robbi

customer_reviews.title: I have an unhealthy love for this stuff....
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mask. Ever. It calms my skin down and gives me the right amount of hydration for my dry sensitive skin. Now that I have it, I don't think I could ever live without it. I've had the jar for quite a while now and you can barely tell there's even a dent out of it. It will last a long time!

customer_reviews.title: I Love, love, love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It is one of my beauty staples I must keep on hand. It is awesome as an overnight moisturizing mask. It replenishes the moisture and helps my skin recover.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

product_meta.title: Rose Stem Cell Bio-Repair Gel Mask, Brightening, Hydrating and Firming Facial Mask for Signs of Aging
product_meta.description:
Cutting-edge plant biotechnology isolates and replicates the perfect rose stem cells for maximum anti-aging benefits. With state-of-the-art, 21st century breakthrough stem cell technology, five rose stem cells are blended with four rose extracts in a cooling gel for younger-looking skin. Helps improve the signs of aging, including the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, dehydration, dullness and sagging as it tones the look of skin. Reveals silky soft, radiant, beautiful, younger-looking skin.

BRAND STORY
An influential segment leader in the beauty industry, Peter Thomas Roth corners the clinical market as a groundbreaking, results-focused innovator committed to his brand philosophy: Breakthrough formulas. Astonishing results.
